raw_comment:
1. The first thing I notice is that majority of the people who say the world is getting better are younger kids who live in wealthier and well developed countries. I also notice that the stricter countries have a less positive outlook.
2. I wonder how many people from each country were asked this question. Was it enough to say that this is an accurate experiment
3. This relates to me because I am a part of that 15-24 year olds living in the United States. My voice is represented by the dot thats from the US.
4. My catchy headline is Is the world a better place?
ace_sentences: Most people who say that the world is getting better are younger kids.
These younger kids live in wealthier countries.
These younger kids live in well-developed countries.
Stricter countries have a less positive outlook.
I wonder how many people from each country were asked this question.
I wonder if the number of people was enough.
If the number of people was enough then this experiment is accurate.
I live in the United States.
This dot is from the United States.
The headline is: Is the world a better place?
